evs.utilities.matrix
Class Matrix2D

java.lang.Object
  evs.utilities.matrix.Matrix
      evs.utilities.matrix.Matrix2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanMatrix2D, DoubleMatrix2D, IntegerMatrix2D
public abstract class Matrix2D
extends Matrix

An abstract base class for 2D matrices. When constructing a subclass with a Java array, the subclasses do not currently require the input array to contain a constant number of columns, but great care should be taken when constructing a subclass in this way, as some of the methods will fail with an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if a non-existing index is referenced in the original Java array.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com
See Also:
